channel.title: Code on Troy Salem Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Code on Troy Salem Blog

item.title: BreakerKit: Circuit Breaker Pattern
item.description: Overview Every app eventually meets The Outside World. The Outside World is where "fetch" becomes: an API that is slow sometimes a dependency that is down right now a vendor that rate limits you for breathing too loudly a database that is fine until it is not When that happens, most systems fail in the dumbest possible way: they keep trying, they keep waiting, they pile up threads/promises/jobs, and then they fall over from the weight.

item.title: C64: Lost Signal
item.description: About A digital escape room experience set in the retro aesthetic of a Commodore 64 computer. Navigate through cryptographic puzzles, hidden messages, and retro computing challenges to uncover the lost signal. Play Here The Signal You haul a beige relic out of an abandoned office, dust in the vents, a coffee ring fossilized on its case. It's a Commodore 64, the once faithful terminal of a NASA communications researcher, late 1980s.
